creator: panizir@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 34983
The snapshot from the Jmeter FTP request

I have a server to which I am sending my files through FTP request Jmeter protocol. I get this error in the results page and I don't know where the error resource is.

org.apache.commons.net.io.CopyStreamException: IOException caught while copying.

creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Do you have more information?

It would be nice to have the log file (especially if there are any stacktraces). What kind of setup is this? Did it work with older versions of JMeter? If so, when did it stop working?

Closing as we didn't get any feedback.
Feel free to reopen with more details.
Thanks
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
